title: Electromagnetics Simulation-Based Advanced Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Conducted in a mobile environment utilizing digital devices, with a focus on visualizing and understanding complex electromagnetism concepts through computer simulations

learning_goals: Learners can explain core theories of electromagnetism (such as Faraday’s Law, Lenz’s Law, etc.) with over 85% accuracy.
Learners can reproduce electromagnetic phenomena using simulation tools and interpret results with 90% accuracy.
Learners can propose solutions for applying analyzed complex electromagnetic systems to real-world engineering problems through three or more case studies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
